properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 31 at 1:20PM MST until February 1 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 45 mph in
valleys. Terrain above 6000 feet: southwest winds of 35 to 55
mph with gusts up 65 mph.

* WHERE...Bad Rock Canyon, Essex, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan
Lake, Marias Pass, and Polebridge.

* WHEN...From 1 PM to 11 PM MST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result. Large waves could occur on area lakes.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 11 PM MST SATURDAY
